law.catch_line: Bonds issued under this subtitle, a transfer of the bonds, the interest payable on the bonds, and an...
law.text: Bonds issued under this subtitle, a transfer of the bonds, the interest payable on the bonds, and any income derived from the bonds, including any profit realized in the sale or exchange of the bonds, shall be exempt from taxation by the State or by any of its counties, municipalities, or public units of any kind.
